questions.question: Which of the following is not a valid way to read multiple datasets from a single reader?
options: Click the drop-down and choose Select Multiple Folders/Files.
Ctrl+ or Shift+click on Windows (or Cmd+ or Shift+click on Mac) when using the File Browser.
Provide a comma-delimited list of files.

questions.question: You can use wildcard expressions in the Source Dataset parameter to read multiple datasets with one reader.
After using Merge Feature Type, there is no way to split your data back into its original feature types during processing.
What technique would you use if you wanted to write your features to both Excel and Esri Shapefile format?
options: A regular expression in your Destination Dataset parameter
Directory and File Pathnames Reader and a FeatureReader
